Description: Dubai Integrated Economic Zones Authority (DIEZA):Established in 2021, Dubai Integrated Economic Zones Authority (DIEZ) consolidates and integrates the products and services of Dubai Airport Free Zone (DAFZ), Dubai Silicon Oasis (DSO), and the Dubai CommerCity (DCC). Home to more than 5,000 registered companies from across 20 industries, DIEZ is at the heart of Dubai’s economic success – a major economic catalyst in the city’s development.General Management·Lead the effective achievement of the Licensing section’s objectives by managing deliverables, performance, developing, and motivating employees in order to support business units in maximizing individual and functional performance.·Coordinate the activities of the Licensing teams to ensure that all business unit requirements are carried out efficiently, in line with the annual business plans, policies and procedures.Contract and Data Administration·Ensure all contract services are managed whilst complying to the contract management plan.·Coordinate the usage of primary data and information to keep in line with emerging trends.Client Management·Advising clients with the necessary requirements for registration and license issuance.·Ensures that clients commit with the freehold rules and regulations and are up to date with the required amendments.·Collaborate internally and act as a customer champion across cross-functional teams to ensure that the business requirements are met.●Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience with 2 years in a relevant managerial level position●Arabic language desired (advanced)●English language required (advanced)●Knowledge of UAE rules and regulations●Knowledge and experience in handling various lease related agreements●Planning, organizing, and negotiating skillsJob Details
